column1: Services: Funeral service will be 10:00 AM Wednesday
column3: 2015 at St. Pius X Catholic Church
column4: 6905 Blondo Street followed by burial at Westlawn-Hillcrest Memorial Park. Visitation: Visitation will be held from 5:00-7:00 PM followed by a wake service at 7:00 PM at John A. Gentleman Mortuaries 72nd Street Chapel.
